meanings.definition: a group of individuals in the Zapotec culture of Oaxaca, Mexico who are assigned male at birth but dress and behave in ways traditionally associated with women
meanings.sent1: The muxes in the community are respected for their unique role.
meanings.sent2: During the festival, the muxes showcased their traditional attire.
meanings.sent3: The muxe's fashion sense always adds a touch of flair to the festivities.
meanings.sent4: In the colorful tapestry of the community, the muxes stand out like vibrant threads.
meanings.sent5: The muxes' presence brings a sense of diversity and acceptance to the town.

meanings.definition: the plural form of the word 'mux', which is a colloquial term for a multiplexer in electronics and telecommunications technology.
meanings.sent1: The technician installed multiple muxes to enhance the network's efficiency.
meanings.sent2: The data center uses various muxes to manage the incoming signals.
meanings.sent3: When the system crashed, all the muxes seemed to go on strike!
meanings.sent4: The muxes work together like a symphony orchestra, harmonizing the data flow.
meanings.sent5: Each of the muxes plays a crucial role in ensuring smooth communication.
